website_summaries.verdict: Versatile cable lock system that works with all types of laptop computers, including Apple laptops.
pros: Cable is coiled to keep it out of your way but will fully stretch to a nice length of six feet
Ships with two keys so you always have a spare available
Because of its design, you can use it on any electronic device you own
Not limited to a certain brand or model type
cons: Uses an adhesive anchor plate as the lock, which adds bulk to your device
Adhesive may wear out over time

customer_reviews.title: It is a good way to for me not to have to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a hand held Nintendo Game I use in a Gaming Trailer I share with the children in a Low Income Neighborhood. It is a good way to for me not to have to keep watching to see if it is still here...I love it
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE JUNK! BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these for restaurant tablets in a public area, These are so bad you can pull them right off with a little strength- preventing its purpose. Also two of the locks broke within a week
customer_reviews.author: joseph Dauber

customer_reviews.title: Tablet lock
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Does the trick, but if someone really wanted it, in sure they could just pull hard enough at the part that sticks to the tablet, and it would come off.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and the back plate fits well on an iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and the back plate fits well on an iPhone 6. The glue is strong and the cable very secure. The keys provided work well and are easy to lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Roy M.

customer_reviews.title: wanted a coiled cable
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for a coiled cable and an plate to also attach to an ipad, the lock also fits snug on my lenovo flex5 , seems like it is well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Peters

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Since no one has had a chance to try and defeat it I can not fully review it but it is definitely what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: works well I little to get to attach, had to use gorilla glue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a security solution for your tablet or even phone
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to secure your electronic devices anywhere from a tablet to a cell phone this lock will work for you. The locking plate is flat enough for a cell phone if need be but strong enough for a tablet. The adhesive tape works well and holds strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kev&Kris

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Functional
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly high security, but they worked well for an exhibitions of digital are we had open to the public. Easy to use and a decent theft deterrent. Would be nice to have the option to order them keyed alike.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this lock on my daughters tablet pretty much did it’s job Will be purchasing another one for my other daughters tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Not just for computers
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy to use security device for my outdoor surveillance cameras
customer_reviews.author: Southern Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Using on my cellphone
customer_reviews.text: It took only seconds to install on my cell phone. The position of the lock makes it look like a stand instead of a security device. The "plate" on the phone is very flat. It doesn't interfere with use. I am at peace knowing my cell phone will not be stolen from my desk again. Price is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy  P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and install. Exactly what I needed to anchor a device.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith Mount

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product definitely recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Ana De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Strong and secure
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. Easy to use and my iPad is much more secure!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: works great. Steel cable is a bit tightly curled but is slowly relaxing a bit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: I can leave my desk at work and dont need to worry about it getting stolen. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Parr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work, my laptop was stolen shortly after I got the lock on it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C

customer_reviews.title: Including an anchor would be nice
customer_reviews.text: It is is easy to use and very durable. It would be nice the kit includes an anchor of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really easy to use and compatible for any type of PC. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Takumi

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock
customer_reviews.text: My office requires that we lock our devices when unattended and this perfectly fills that requirement. My previous lock had a coil wire and it never laid nicely on the work-space. Reviews for other devices complained that they were difficult to manage the combination and that they would inadvertently reset themselves. Neither of these are in issue with this lock. Great price, looks exactly like the picture and shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to figure out how to use at first. I would give it about 5 stars. It would have helped to get a better instructions manual. Overall, it is a good item that works well and does it's job!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kim

product_meta.title: Laptop Lock Cable Lock Computer Lock Hardware Security Cable Lock Anti Theft Lock for Laptop, MacBook, iPad, Tablets
product_meta.description:
Color:key cable lock with silver anchor

Product Description:

Instructions For Use(2 Ways)

For iPad,Macbook and other tablets without security lockholes.

There is a anchor plate lined strong adhesive, bound the plate to the hard surface of the devices, then insert the locking head into the plate with keys and loop the cable around a fixed object.

For those laptops with security slot

Just simply insert the lock head into the slot, and loop the cable around a fixed object.




100% Reliable and Anti Theft

Adopting super strong 3M industrial adhesive, the plate is very difficult to peal off once it is attached, can effectively secure your devices.

Made of strong twisted steel, the cable is cut resistant and 100% reliable.
feature_bullets: The self-coiling cable stretches up to 6 feef(180cm).
Works with all tablets, smart phones, laptops, macbooks,iPad, notebooks.
Made of strong twisted steel, the cable is cut resistant and 100% reliable.
Protect your electronic device in public places.
Simply loop your laptop around a stationary object with the cut-resistant galvanized steel chain.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
